document_data.mainbody:
Cassie Wheynstown was an inhabitant of the city of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Cassie Wheynstown was an aged human woman with a shaved head and light skin.
In the , Cassie was slaughtered alongside Courageous Little Kimmabeth by Orin the Red, a Bhaalspawn member of the Murder Tribunal. In her depraved commitment to Bhaal, the deity of murder, Orin turned Kimmabeths, as well as several other victims bodies, into a gruesome effigy glorifying the Lord of Murder.
